00016         inline Value Frame::setSlot( const Symbol& name, const Value value )
00017         {
00018                 return _slots[&name] = value;
00019         }
00020 
00021         inline Value Frame::getSlot( const Symbol& name )
00022         {
00023                 if (_slots.find( &name ) != _slots.end())
00024                 {
00025                         return _slots[&name];
00026                 }
00027 
00028                 return Value();
00029         }

00031         inline Value Frame::eval( Value receiver, const Array& args )
00032         {
00033                 return this;
00034         }

00036         inline Value Frame::send( Value receiver, const Symbol& selector, const Array& args )
00037         {
00038                 if (_slots.find( &selector ) != _slots.end())
00039                 {
00040                         Value method = _slots[ &selector ];
00041                         
00042                         return method.eval( receiver, args );
00043                 }
00044         
00045                 cout << "Slot not found" << endl;
00046         
00047                 return &Void::instance();
00048         }
